sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>sun</radical> <radical>call</radical>s out to the earth by <kanji>shining</kanji> down on it.
meaningInfo: The sun doesn't have a voice, unfortunately, so it calls out the only way it can, with its shining rays.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>shining</kanji> is aimed directly at the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (<ja>しょう</ja>). The sun is shining on the Shougun to not only show its support for his leadership, but to let him shine brighter than anyone else in Japan.
readingInfo: Picture the Shougun standing in the shining sunlight. He's so bright and beautiful!
